input_text.Prompt:
Given a item name and item keywords, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Item name:
Kamik Squirt Rain Boot (Toddler/Little Kid)

Item keywords:
100% Rubber
Imported
Rubber sole
Shaft measures approximately 7" from arch
Heel measures approximately 0.5"
Boot opening measures approximately 11" around
Waterproof
Flexible sole
Recyclable
Reflective patches

Product description:
input_text.Response A: The Kamik Squirt Rain Boot (Toddler/Little Kid) is the ideal footwear for keeping your little one's feet warm and dry in rainy weather. Made with a 100% recyclable rubber upper and a flexible, synthetic rubber sole, these boots are completely waterproof, making them perfect for splashing in puddles or playing outside in the rain. The convenient pull-on design makes them easy to put on and take off, while reflective patches provide enhanced visibility in low-light conditions.
input_text.Response B: This adorable rain boot features a soft, flexible upper with reflective patches for added safety, a non-slip, waterproof rubber outsole, and an easy-on side gore.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.
